channel.title: From Scratch on João Tremoço
channel.description: Recent content in From Scratch on João Tremoço

item.title: Transformers Almost From Scratch
item.description: Educational PyTorch implementation of core Transformer components with a tiny LM (and a ViT variant).

item.title: Neural Network from Scratch (NumPy)
item.description: A modular neural network built using only NumPy — layers, forward/backward, gradients, and Iris demo.
